original_title: Cecilia Bergman Chaves: Una Buena Vida
overview: Cecilia Bergman Chaves: Una Buena Vida chronicles the life of charismatic Venezuelan media pioneer Cecilia Martinez, through the eyes of Venezuelan renown director Alfredo Anzola, and it's a memory of Colegio Chaves, the Caracas prestigious educational institution with 170 years of history.
title: Cecilia Bergman Chaves: Una Buena Vida
